description:
UTurn by ProudGuymoisturizer for men - the ultimate new generation of easy skin care, essentially formulated for the busy modern man.This complex, anti aging and repair formula gel is loaded with the best face care ingredients to protect and nourish skin, fight wrinkles and improve texture by closing open pores.The skin will feel noticeably smooth to the touch and younger looking after the first application.Vital ingredients include:
Aloe Vera - soothing, astringent, and protecting. Aloe is also excellent for sensitive skins, rosacea conditions and dry skin.Cassia Angustifolia Seed: Hyaluronic acid in a botanical form, creates a barrier that plumps up the skin to help reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles.Organic Jojoba Oil: Beneficial for treating all skin types. Jojoba oil dissolves clogged pores, and aids the complexion to return to its normal pH balanceActive ingredients include Argan Oil, Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Cucumber, Frankincense, Glycine,Gotu Kola, Jojoba Oil, Kosher Vegetable Glycerin, L'Arginine, Licorice, Matrixyl 3000, MSM, Potassium Sorbate, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Sodium Benzoate, Periwinkle, Reishi.USA made - the perfect gift for men who want to keep looking good!Turn back the clock with UTurn - try it and see for yourself - just CLICK the "Add to Cart" order button at the top right of the page NOW!Full 30-day money back guarantee.
title: Moisturizer for Men - UTurn by ProudGuy Skin Care 5-in-1 Aftershave Gel - Anti Aging - Paraben FREE - Dark Circles Under Eyes - Skin Tightening & Repair - Anti Shine - Minimize Pores Reduce Wrinkles - Instant 24 Hour Youthful Result - Unique Gift Ideas - USA Made
